mapper.insert: insert into board (boardNo, title,regDate ,modifiedDate,category, address, area,startDate,endDate,budget,part,require) values (boardNo_seq.NEXTVAL,#{title},sysdate,sysdate,#{category},#{address},#{area},#{startDate},#{endDate},#{budget},#{part},#{require})
mapper.update: update board set title = #{title}, category = #{category}, address = #{address}, area = #{area} , startDate = #{startDate}, endDate= #{endDate}, budget= #{budget}, part= #{part}, require= #{require} where boardNo = #{boardNo}
mapper.select: select boardNo, nickname, part, title, address, regDate, modifiedDate, view_count from board order by boardNo desc, regDate desc
SELECT boardNo, nickname, part, title, address, regDate, modifiedDate, view_count FROM board WHERE boardNo BETWEEN ((#{page}-1)*10+1) AND (#{page}*10) order by boardNo desc, regDate desc

select boardNo, nickname, part, title, address, regDate, modifiedDate, view_count FROM ( SELECT boardNo, nickname, part, title, address, regDate, modifiedDate, view_count, row_number() over(order by boardNo desc) as rNum from board ) mb WHERE rNum BETWEEN ((#{pageStart}-1)*#{perPageNum}+1) AND (#{pageStart}*#{perPageNum}) order by boardNo desc, regDate desc
select count(boardNo) from board where boardNo > 0
mapper.insert: insert into board_attach(fullname, boardNo, regdate) values (#{fullName}, boardNo_seq.currval,sysdate)
mapper.select: select fullname from board_attach where boardNo = #{boardNo} order by regdate
